guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for sacituzumab govitecan and UGT1A1

text.html: "Individuals who are homozygous for the uridine diphosphate-glucuronosyl transferase 1A1 (UGT1A1)*28 allele are at increased risk for neutropenia and may be at increased risk for other adverse reactions following initiation of TRODELVY [sacituzumab govitecan] treatment...Closely monitor patients with reduced UGT1A1 activity for severe neutropenia. The appropriate dose for patients who are homozygous for UGT1A1*28 is not known and should be considered based on individual patient tolerance to treatment." See label for more information.

citations.title: Drugs@FDA: Drug Product sacituzumab govitecan-hziy BLA761115
